description: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time...
full_summary:
[browsable timeline]

### Tender for Project Management Support Services (WS3800398796)
#### Tender Announcement

The Department of National Defence (DND) has issued a tender for Project Management Support Services (WS3800398796), soliciting proposals from eligible suppliers under the Technical Support Programs and Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders.

#### Tender Details
- Bidder should be requalified suppliers holding a TSPS SA Tier 2 (>$3.75M) in the National Capital Region (NCR) at the time of bid closing.
- The contract will be awarded for three (3) years, with two (2) one-year irrevocable options.
- Required services include project management, business analytics, change management, training development and delivery activities for current and future acquisition projects.

#### Tender Timeline

- Amendment to Closing Time: Bidders should disregard closing times listed on Ariba Discovery and the Buyandsell website. 
- Mandatory tender submission deadline: January 26, 2023 at 14:00 EST. 
- Any bids submitted after the deadline will be declared non-responsive.

#### Notice Type

- Competitive – selectiver tendering.
- Highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be the selection criteria.

#### Contracting Entity

- Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) in conjunction with Department of National Defence (DND).
- The contracting entities can be contacted for further information and clarification.

#### Trade Agreements

- Canadian trade agreements include, but are not limited to, the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership.

#### Tender Documents

- Tender documents are available for download from the Buyandsell website or through Ariba Discovery.

### Contact Information

- Nabil Ghattach (SPAC/PSPC) can be contacted to provide additional information or clarification.
- Email: [nabil.ghaddab@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nabil.ghaddab@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Please note that changes in abbreviations and keywords are the result of professional rephrasing. AbaraDiscovery replaces Ariba Discovery. Note asterisks removed from keywords.
